title: I Can't Download League of Legends
body: After using the Setup Wizard and selecting Finish, I get the message "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working". I'm using the North American Windows Download option. Any ideas on how to fix this so I can download League of Legends?

replies.body: I did all that the guide said to do and I still get the same error. I guess I'm doomed forever...

The patcher needs permission from your OS to launch or scan files.  This error usually indicates that it needs access to launch.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get that access, and you should be good to go.  Hope that helps!
